title: Propix AI
description: PropixAI is an AI-powered image editor that enables users to enhance, modify, and create visuals effortlessly. It combines intuitive design with advanced AI features to deliver professional-quality results in seconds.

title: Storeo
description: A cloud storage web app that lets users securely upload, organize, and access files anytime, anywhere. Built with a modern UI for a smooth and intuitive experience.

title: Jett AI
description: A real-time chat application that generates intelligent, context-aware responses using Google AI API.

title: Image Gallery
description: A responsive web app that fetches and displays millions of high-quality images from third-party APIs.
